reference.title: Android Emulator preferences
reference.shortdesc: Contains preferences that control the operation of the Android Emulator view.

refbody.section: To access these preferences, select Preferences from the FileWindow menu. Then from the list of preferences, select MOTODEV StudioAndroid Emulator.

stentry.uicontrol: Show emulators externally upon closing the Emulator View

strow.stentry: This option should normally be selected. Clear this option if the emulator unexpectedly stops when you close the Android Emulator view. If this option is cleared, when you close the Android Emulator view the emulator will continue to run although it will not be displayed, either in an Eclipse view or in an external window. Re-opening the Android Emulator view will cause the running emulator to once again be displayed.This option is not applicable on systems running Mac OS X.
